column4: hi all....im running ubuntu on vmware and i can browse internet. ip of my ubuntu is 192.168.1.151 and of windows host is 192.168.1.123. When i try to connect to ubuntu on vmware using putty i get error message "network error: connection refused". what sort of settings/configurations i need to fix this thing?
it starts the server automatically when you install it and on subsequent restarts
if you need to configure it, the config file is /etc/ssh/sshd_config
